summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing a Memorandum of Understanding between The City of Seattle and International Association of Fire Fighters, Local 27, amending Article 12 of the collective bargaining agreement between the City and Local 27, which is effective through August 31, 1986; providing protective clothing and equipment pursuant to WAC 296-305-060 and a modified uniform allowance to certain Seattle Fire Department employees effective January 1, 1986; superseding inconsistent ordinances, and providing payment therefor.
